common.str: 魔兽世界英雄榜是一个巨大的搜索魔兽世界的信息数据库 - 直接从真实服务器上搜索。这是关于角色，竞技场战队，公会，物品，声望奖励的最全面和最新的魔兽世界数据库。

str.p: This interface allows you to select up to three characters on this account to bookmark for easy access. If you have more than three eligible characters, you must first unselect a character before selecting a different one.
The characters you select will also receive alerts when any of them are invited to new calendar events.

For more information on creating and exporting custom feeds, refer to the FAQ displayed below.

arenaCalc.str: 本周我能获得多少竞技场点数呢?
想得到期望的竞技场装备平均需要多少竞技场等级?
我什么时候可以得到竞技场奖励？

str.p: Each team has a Team Rating. This rating reflects how well your team is doing in the Arena System; the higher your rating, the better. Every time your team wins a match, your rating goes up, and every time you lose a match, your rating goes down. The amount by which your rating changes depends on your team's rating compared to the other team's rating. As a frame of reference, playing a team with a rating within a close range of your own team's rating will result in a net change of 16 rating.

At the end of each week, your Team Rating is used to calculate how many Arena Points your team will receive for this week. Your team must have played a minimum of ten matches per week to be rewarded with Arena Points, and a team member must have been in at least 30% of the week’s matches to be eligible for that week's points. It is important to note that the points you receive in a given week is determined by only one team, and not by combining all your teams' points. Whichever team you are a member of that would receive the most points after accounting for Team Rating and team type becomes the sole source for your points for that week. Note that 2v2 and 3v3 teams are subject to a handicap where they receive fewer points than a 5v5 team with the same Team Rating.

Arena Points are used as currency to purchase Arena Rewards. You can stockpile a maximum of 5,000 Arena Points and they do not decay over time. The Arena Calculator will help you determine how many points you will gain from a given rating and how many weeks it will take you to earn your next arena reward with a given rating.

arenaCalc.str: 竞技场等级和点数是如何计算的？
2v2竞技场战队仅能获得同等级5v5竞技场战队所获点数的76%。
3v3竞技场战队仅能获得同等级5v5竞技场战队所获点数的88%。
如果等级<=1500 那么 竞技场点数=0.22*等级+14
Bookmark a profile to auto-populate some of the fields in the calculator. Click here to search for a profile.

竞技场统计数据并不实时更新。
并且只显示来自一个战队的等级。
Arena rewards from Season are now purchased with Honor Points and Battleground Marks of Honor.
View the full set of Season rewards at the link below.

searchPlugin.str: Add the World of Warcraft Armory search field to your browser for instant Armory access from anywhere on the web!
Click Yes in the popup dialogue.
Drag the "WoW Armory" box from Appearance → Buttons → My buttons to your browser bar.
To add the Armory to Opera's default search engine list:
Enter the following information into the popup dialogue and click OK:

Name: WoW Armory
Keyword: wow
Address: http://www.wowarmory.com/search.xml?searchQuery=%s&searchType=all
You should now be able to select "WoW Armory" from the dropdown list of search engines.

dynamic.str: 在日历中有些日程无法加载。\n\n请过几分钟再尝试一次。
出现在日历中的必需是最近活跃的角色角色，并且要求不低于10级。

feed.str: 将此日历导入至您默认的应用程序

A character must be recently active, on an account in good standing, on a European realm, and be at least level 10 to appear on a calendar feed you create here.
To select characters from a different region, such as Europe, use the region selection menu at the bottom of the page.
Your Calendar Feed URL contains a unique security key. Are you sure you want to reset this key and create a new URL?
Your calendar feed now has a new URL. Update this new URL in your online calendars to resynch them to your calendar feed.

This customization tool allows you to create a custom calendar feed for up to five of your characters' player calendars. The feed can be used to synchronize your characters' Player Calendars with any compatible online calendar application, such as Google Calendar, and Apple's iCal, to name a few.
For more information on creating and exporting custom feeds, refer to the FAQ displayed below.

mobileArmoryPage.str: Ever wanted to check your raid schedule, look up a piece of PvP gear, or concoct a new talent spec while on the go? The World of Warcraft Mobile Armory app for iPhone™ and iPod touch® lets you access the official Armory database from anywhere you have a mobile connection, and features much of the same functionality as the Armory website, including:
The World of Warcraft Mobile Armory is available now as a free download from the Apple App Store.
Search for and view any character, item, guild, or Arena team in World of Warcraft.
Seamlessly import your own character, guild, and Arena team profiles.
Access your in-game calendar of events.
Plan out talent specs using the fully functional talent calculator.

mobileArmoryInterstitial.str: There's a new way to browse the Armory from your iPhone™ or iPod touch®. Check out the World of Warcraft Mobile Armory, available now as a free download from the Apple App Store.

wowRemotePage.str: World of Warcraft Remote Auction House

Now you can access the World of Warcraft Auction House from your web browser or mobile device. Browse the Auction House for free, or with a subscription to the new World of Warcraft Remote service, you can:
Bid on and buy out auctions with real-time results.
Create auctions from items in your bags, bank, or mailbox.
Collect gold earned in your auctions.
per 30 days
Only
*Prices may vary by country and currency.
Browse the World of Warcraft Remote Auction House for FREE

Anyone can browse the Auction House via the Armory website or mobile device for FREE. Follow the links below to visit the Auction House website or download the free app on iTunes® for the iPhone® or iPod touch®. Additional mobile devices will be supported in the future.

Learn more about
World of Warcraft Remote.
iPhone and iPod touch are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.

The Remote Auction House lets you browse your realm's auction house through a web browser or the iPhone's Armory app. With a subscription to World of Warcraft Remote, you can also both bid on (or buy out) existing auctions as well as list your own items for sale from your bags, bank, and mailbox.
